overview: The documentary tragicomedy "Magic Land" tells the story of a conservative girl Maryana, 23, who has just emigrated to the United States from Ukraine. Alone in this new and alien world, she meets Anya, 27. Anya works as a dancer in nightclubs for immigrants, and agrees to be Maryana's guide to a strange looking glass world at the crossroads of the United States and the USSR. Mariana does not yet realize that this journey will change her forever.
title: Wonderland
